data.name: Hi Eggplant!
data.detailed_description:
An original planting experience game. It is mainly about the fun of labor and observation in real planting.

You need to fertilize, sow, water, and de-worm plants from a single seed, through the germination stage, through the seedling stage,
Seedling stage, flowering stage, fruiting stage, until maturity.

Because of the plants may die at any time due to lack of water, fertilization transition, falling, diseases and insect pests, we need to pay attention to the health of plants with a magnifying glass at all times to avoid the plant death.

The excitement of the pest control session is combined with the lightness of everyday life.

There will be some tips in the mailbox to help us grow more high-quality purple star eggplants!

Go for 10 eggplants!
data.about_the_game:
An original planting experience game. It is mainly about the fun of labor and observation in real planting.

The excitement of the pest control session is combined with the lightness of everyday life.

data.short_description: It's an original farming experience game, with a different experience from most of the farming games. You can harvest high-quality eggplants through reasonable physical distribution, careful observation and accumulated experience. I hope you can feel the fun of actual planting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce560
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: None

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: IOS 10.15
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce560
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: None
